name: PROTOCOLO - X
description:
Five years ago, a research space station was installed on asteroid X10-k. It was routine from year to year to change teams. The last team of researchers sent has not reported for over a month.

The broadcast system is said to have been a week since it was shut down, but the system station is operational.

A search party is being sent out containing three missions:

1-Report the actual situation of the station

2-Find the crew

3-Bring them saved to the Planet.

This team consists of Brolyn Jones (Pilot and Operations Captain), Adasa Moore (Medical Scientist), Roben White (Spatial Scientific Investigation Specialist) and Rebbeca Allen (Technology Systems Specialist).

*Game in development #horror #rpg #scifi #survival
